interestingcomments.content: How does the Leica D-Lux 3 compare to the GR-D? It seems that given the price range and size that would be a more interesting comparison. Go here: Welcome to the Stephen Harris archive. to see a portrait taken with the D-Lux 3. I used a studio lighting set up, and the flash on the D-Lux 3 to trigger the slaves on the studio lights. Steve Harris
